code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./MyAppointments.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MyAppointments=()=>{const[appointments,setAppointments]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const email=sessionStorage.getItem("email");useEffect(()=>{setLoading(true);fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL,"/appointments")).then(res=>{if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to fetch appointments.");return res.json();}).then(data=>{const filtered=data.filter(a=>a.email===email);setAppointments(filtered);setLoading(false);}).catch(err=>{console.error("Failed to fetch appointments:",err);setLoading(false);});},[email]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"center-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"appointments-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My Appointments"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"loading",children:"Loading..."}):appointments.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No appointments yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Doctor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Speciality"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Time"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:appointments.map(appt=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appt.doctorName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appt.doctorSpeciality}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appt.date||new Date(appt.timeSlot).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appt.selectedSlot||new Date(appt.timeSlot).toLocaleTimeString([],{hour:"2-digit",minute:"2-digit"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appt.status})]},appt.id))})]})]})});};export default MyAppointments;
